players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice, Bob, we need to figure out who could be the detective quickly. Diana's death is suspicious, and we can't afford any mistakes."

Bob: "Diana's death is indeed suspicious. As a villager, I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to help us deduce who the mafia might be. Let's try to stay focused and share any observations."
You: "Alice here. I investigated Charlie last night and found out he is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest Charlie today to protect the town."
Bob: "Alice claims Charlie is the mafia. I don't have any information to confirm or deny this, but we need to act on what we have. If Alice is telling the truth, Charlie is our only option."
You: "Alice again. Bob supports my claim, which strengthens our position. We must vote to arrest Charlie now before he can harm us further."
Charlie: "Alice, your quick accusation seems too convenient. What proof do you have besides your word? Bob, be cautious—false accusations only help the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
